title: Teaching others in community about IDD experience
description: Teaching others in community about IDD experience
content:
Scenario: Teaching others in community about IDD experience
    Given a local school wants to teach students about inclusion
    And Jordan is willing to share their experience
    When Jordan participates in educational presentation
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan prepare accessible talking points
    And Jordan shares their story in their own words with support
    And students learn from Jordan directly, not just about IDD in abstract
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for educational contribution
    And Jordan's teaching shapes community understanding
    And Jordan experiences being an educator and advocate
    And the community learns to see IDD people as full humans
